      Subclasses of ControlInterfaceException in framework.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WrongControlInterfaceStateException
      Exception thrown when actions are attempted while control interface being in the wrong state.
      class  WrongSystemStateException
      Exception thrown when actions are attempted while the system being in the wrong state.
